model.item

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.item.Item
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InteractiveItem, ObstacleItem, OneShotItem, TakeableItem

    public abstract class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates all item types. Allows for easy handling by map/entity
